## My Home Department

## Interest in the Course

Hello everyone, my name is Chun. I am a second-year doctoral student at ASU, my current research focuses on social media and television audience. Personally, I have a strong interest in various statistical analysis software, such as SPSS, AMOS, Smart-PLS, and R. I look forward to learning more practical skills about R in this class.
